reporter_caption.center: MURRAY HILL COMPANY v. BOREAS REALTY COMPANY, 215 N.Y. 679 (1915)

caption.center: MURRAY HILL COMPANY, Respondent, v. BOREAS REALTY COMPANY et al.,
Appellants, and EMPIRE BRICK AND SUPPLY COMPANY et al., Respondents,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
Joseph V. Mitchell and Edward J. Dowling for appellants.
Richard S. Newcombe and Frank L. Cunningham for plaintiff, respondent.
Wilbur F. Earp for defendants, respondents.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment affirmed, with costs; no opinion.
Concur: WILLARD BARTLETT, Ch. J., WERNER, CHASE, CUDDEBACK, HOGAN, MILLER and SEABURY, JJ.
